rules: Rule1: If the vehicle needs repair, then it is not the case that the vehicle has a malfunction.
Rule2: Provided that the GPS tracking is active, the vehicle is operational.
Rule3: Whenever the RFID tracking is active, if the system is not powered on, then the drone delivers the package.
Rule4: In the event that the emergency stop is activated, the system lock is disabled.
Rule5: Either the emergency stop is activated or it is not the case that the system has a manual override.
Rule6: The authorization for access is valid or the authorization for access is expired.
Rule7: Should the authorization for access be expired, then if the system is not powered on, the drone delivers the package.
Rule8: Whenever the animal is trained for delivery, the animal is capable of navigation.
Rule9: The animal is trained for delivery or the animal is certified for delivery.

Rule10: In the case that the animal is certified for delivery, if the technology is connected to the network, then either the vehicle is operational or, should the system not be powered on, the drone delivers the package.

Rule11: Provided the animal is capable of navigation, then if the technology is connected to the network, either the vehicle is operational or, whenever the system is not powered on, the drone delivers the package.
Rule12: Assuming the furniture is authorized for placement, the furniture is compliant with regulations.
Rule13: Either the furniture is authorized for placement or the furniture is approved for the location.
Rule14: Should the furniture be approved for the location, then either the vehicle is operational or, if the system is not powered on, the drone delivers the package.
Rule15: If it is not the case that either the GPS tracking is active or the RFID tracking is active, then the system has a manual override.
Rule16: If it is not the case that if the authorization for access is valid then the vehicle is operational, then it is not the case that a security breach is detected.

Rule17: If it is not the case that if the furniture is compliant with regulations then either the vehicle is operational or, if the system is not powered on, the drone delivers the package, then the vehicle has a malfunction.

Rule18: If it is not the case that if the furniture is compliant with regulations then either the vehicle is operational or, should the system not be powered on, the drone delivers the package, then the vehicle needs repair.

Rule19: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the authorization for access is valid then the vehicle is operational then a security breach is detected, then an investigation is initiated.

Rule20: If it is not the case that if it is not the case that if the authorization for access is valid then the vehicle is operational then a security breach is detected, then it is not the case that an investigation is initiated.
Rule21: If the system is not powered on, then it is not the case that the drone delivers the package.
facts: Fact1: The technology is connected to the network.
Fact2: It is not the case that the system lock is disabled.
Fact3: It is not the case that the vehicle is operational.
